channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-17005] Improve log message in MobFileCache
item.description: Currently, the MobFileCache prints "MobFileCache is initialized, and the cache size is 2". When MobFileCache is enabled, it can print out config params and it is disabled, it prints explicitly.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
The other caches report using '=' instead of ':'. See [1] Mind making it consistent with them?

[1] https://github.com/apache/hbase/blob/master/hbase-server/src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/io/hfile/CacheConfig.java#L510

-1 overall

2016-11-03 13:34:15,783 INFO [main] mob.MobFileCache(121): MobFileCache enabled with cacheSize=2111, evictPeriods=3600sec, evictRemainRatio=0.5

Thanks for the patch huaxiang sun!
How about to add verbs to the log information? For example "MobFileCache enabled" to "MobFileCache is enabled", and "MobFileCache disabled" to "MobFileCache is disabled".
Stack suggested to remove "is" from these logs, so I guess that it is ok to save space. I can add it back if this makes the log clear. thanks.
I encountered an issue when trying to commit v3 patch, upload a patch v4 for committing.

huaxiang sun, It is okay.
+1, committing this patch to the master branch. Thanks for patch huaxiang sun and thanks Jonathan Hsieh for the review!
